column12: Simplified Chinese

column10: Although his prisoners had escaped, Lord Noboru reacted quickly. Using clever words he framed them for the murder of the Shogun's son and the death of Mugen.
column12: 虽然四人成功逃脱，但昇大名利用花言巧语将他们诬陷为杀害龙之介和无限的凶手。

column10: While the Shogun sent every available man to hunt down the alleged killers, Noboru silently forged plans to assassinate his brother.
column12: 就在将军动用全部人马追捕所谓的凶手之际，昇大名却在暗地里策划暗杀兄长。

column10: Meanwhile, Mugen's companions could do little more than hide from the wrath of the Shogun.
column12: 无限的同伴们则只能疲于躲避将军的搜捕。

column10: Knowing the last wishes of her beloved, Aiko prepared for a final, desperate manoeuvre.
column12: 而如此同时，为了实现无限的遗愿，爱子准备实施一个孤注一掷的计划。

column10: A hidden meeting place. Hayato, Yuki and Takuma wait for Aiko to return.
column12: A hidden meeting place. Hayato, Yuki and Takuma wait for Aiko to return.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Two weeks later
column12: 两周后

column10: … you really think meeting here is a good idea?
column12: ……约在这种地方见面真的好吗？

column10: The place was ransacked some time ago. Perhaps lightning will strike again, but I have my doubts.
column12: 此地不久前已被搜查过一次了。他们再查这里的可能性微乎其微。

column10: … where's Aiko-san?
column12: ……爱子姐在哪？

column10: I don't know, Yuki-chan. She should be here by now.
column12: 我不知道，友希姑娘。她应该已经到了才对。

column10: This is taking too long. I'm out …
column12: 这来得也太晚了。我先走了……

column10: No, don't leave Hayato-san! Please …
column12: 不，不要走！隼人师父……

column9: Hayato is at the door when Aiko enters the room
column10: Aiko-san! You're back!
column12: 爱子姐！你回来啦！

column10: … thought you wouldn't come.
column12: 还以为你不回来了。

column10: Then I am grateful you waited for me.
column12: 但你还是等了这么久，谢谢。

column9: Hayato leans against the wall away from the others
column10: Hmm, will you tell us what kept you so long?
column12: 嗯…那为什么会迟到这么久呢？

column10: I learned the whereabouts of Masaru. He has a residence in this very city.
column12: 我打探到真申的行踪了。他现在就住在这座城里。

column10: Good. Let's kill him.
column12: 正好。那就去杀了他。

column10: I feel your rage, Hayato-san, but we must capture him alive. We will question him, and afterwards we deliver him to the Shogun.
column12: 隼人兄，我理解你的心情，但这次必须抓活的。抓到后先审问他，然后把他交给将军。

column10: Hrm … not my idea of justice.
column12: 哼……这不是我的作风。

column10: But the right way to honour Mugen's sacrifice. Takuma-san, will you prepare the interrogation?
column12: 但这样可以为无限的牺牲讨回公道。琢磨大师，你能做好审问准备吗？

column10: There is not much to work with. A substance perhaps? I would need ingredients, but … with no money …
column12: 嗯，不是什么大事，准备些药就行。不过我还需要一些原料，但……手头没钱……

column10: Let's go together, Takuma-sensei! You show me what you need, and I can get it for you!
column12: 我和你一起去，琢磨师父！你只要告诉我需要什么，我都能帮你搞到！

column10: Very well. It appears we will both be occupied for a while, Aiko-san.
column12: 非常好。但我们俩去备药需要一段时间，爱子小姐。

column10: That is alright. I would like your help with Masaru, Hayato-san
column12: 没关系。隼人兄，我需要你帮我一起去抓真申。

column10: Fine, as long as we do something …
column12: 好吧，但凡能做点什么就好……

column10: We will be back soon. Please be careful, Takuma-san, Yuki-chan.
column12: 我们速去速回。你们要小心，琢磨大师，友希小妹。

column10: Do not worry, we will manage.
column12: 不要担心，我们会处理好的。
